home.title: Discover cooperatives from all around the globe.

aboutUs.sectionOne: Our website was created with the aim of highlighting the strength of the cooperative model. Here, you'll find cooperatives from all over the globe, organized by it's respective sectors, displaying details about these sustainable organizations.
aboutUs.sectionTwo: In a world where collaboration makes a difference, the cooperatives emerge as an example of union and collective prosperity. Unlike traditional companies, cooperatives are organizations formed and run by people with a common goal, where each member has a voice and where all members share the benefits.

error.detailsPage: Error fetching data for this cooperative.
